questions_and_notes: We already defined this variable "where land"; why not just ask  for it "where sea_ice".  If someone wants a combined value for land and sea_ice, they can compute the weighted mean (weighting by fractions)
cell_methods: area: mean (excluding open-ocean portion of cells) time: point
long_name: Surface Temperature Where Land or Sea Ice
comment: Surface temperature of all surfaces except open ocean.
